page.title: 07Truscott
page.content: Truscott is a small hamlet consisting of some twelve dwellings.It is approximately three miles from Launceston and the narrow lanes leading to it make it a somewhat isolated community.The people living there felt that the peace and quiet provided by this isolation were two of the main attractions of living there.Another reason why four families live there is that it is central to their work-they are vets.The only criticism of Truscott is that it is sometimes very windy.The people living there consider their community to be a very friendly and cooperative one.They have even worked together to build their own open air swimming pool.Most of the buildings are made of local stone and date back to the last century or earlier.There are however a few more modern dwellings.
